channel.title: â€“ User Management Microservices
channel.description: Recent content in User Management Microservices on

item.title: Microservices: Email Settings Microservice
item.description:
Keeps settings of email recipients.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang, Dart

This microservice has optional dependencies on the following microservices:

  • Party activities - to log user activities
  • Message Templates - to get message templates
  • Email Delivery - to send email messages

item.title: Microservices: Message Distribution Microservice
item.description:
Distributes messages to one or many recipients using their configured delivery methods: email or sms.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang, Dart

This microservice has optional dependencies on the following microservices:

  • Email Settings - recipient email settings
  • SMS Settings - recipient sms settings
  • Email - email sending
  • SMS Delivery - sms sending
  • Message Templates - message templates

item.title: Microservices: Organizations Microservice
item.description:
Keeps list of working organizations.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang

item.title: Microservices: Party Activities Microservice
item.description:
Logs important party activities like signups, signins, creation, changes or deletion of data items and so on.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang, Dart

item.title: Microservices: Passwords Microservice
item.description:
Password authentication microservice.

  • Sets user passwords and authenticate

  • Safely change passwords

  • Reset and recover passwords via emails

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart

  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC

  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase

  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda

  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang, Dart

This microservice has optional dependencies on the following microservices:

  • Party Activities - to log user activities
  • Email Delivery - to send email notifications to users

item.title: Microservices: Roles Microservice
item.description:
Provides basic role-based authorization mechanism for users.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang, Dart

item.title: Microservices: Sessions Microservice
item.description:
Opens and closes user sessions and stores sessiond data.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang, Dart

item.title: Microservices: Sms Settings Microservice
item.description:
Keeps settings of sms recipients.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Dart

This microservice has optional dependencies on the following microservices:

  • Party Activities - to log user activities
  • Message Templates - to get message templates
  • SMS Delivery - to send sms messages

item.title: Microservices: User Accounts Microservice
item.description:
User account management microservice.

  • Registers users and creates their accounts

  • Keeps key user descriptions and settings (about, location, language, theme, …)

  • Server implementations: NodeJS, Dart

  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC

  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase

  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda

  • Client implementations: NodeJS, .NET, Golang, Dart

This microservice has optional dependencies on the following microservices:

  • Party Activities - to log user activities (signup, signin, change settings)

item.title: Microservices: User invitations Microservice
item.description:
Keeps list of map invitations.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
  • Client implementations: NodeJS, Golang

item.title: Microservices: User roles Microservice
item.description:
Manages roles for user organizations.

  • Server implementations: NodeJS
  • Communication protocols: Direct, Commandable HTTP, Commandable GRPC, GRPC
  • Persistence: Memory, Flat Files, MongoDB, Couchbase
  • Deployment options: Monolith, Process, Docker, AWS Lambda
